title: Yen Rises as Warning From Takaichi Raises Intervention Risk
description: The yen gained on Monday as traders started the week on heightened alert for Japan intervening in the market following the currency’s recent slide.
content: The yen gained on Monday as traders started the week on heightened alert for Japan intervening in the market following the currency’s recent slide.
